document.full_text: in a poor district of bahrain's capital, a few hundred people marched through cramped, crumbling alleyways banging pans and screaming, "down with the regime."
document.title: bahrain's unseen protests fall on deaf ears
lines_and_colors: in a poor district of bahrain's capital, a few hundred people marched through cramped, crumbling alleyways banging pans and screaming, "down with the regime."
